decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted ( 001, 006, 007, 008, 009-A, 010, Design & Access Statement received 20/02/2013
School Travel Plan (dated May 2013) received 03/05/2013

Application Form and location plan received 13/01/14.
 ) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 4 - No demolition or construction work shall take place on the site except between the hours of 8:00am  to 6:00pm on Mondays to Friday and 9 :00am to 1:00pm on Saturdays and none shall take place on Sundays and Public Holidays without the prior agreement of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - The approved Travel Plan (dated May 2013) shall be implemented in accordance with the details contained within this plan. In particular the Travel Plan shall: 
i)	Register a named travel plan champion at http://hounslowtp.org/ 
ii)	Commit to undertake a site audit and staff/visitor travel survey to gauge current travel behaviour using the following link for pupils http://hounslowtp.org/handsup and for the staff http://hounslowtp.org/staffsurvey. The survey must be re-run every year for a total period of 5 years and if requested in writing, a copy of the survey results shall be submitted to the Local Planning Authority.
iii)	Provide an action plan within three months of occupation setting out (with SMART objectives and targets) how the school intends to communicate and promote sustainable transport options to staff and students - e.g. provision of bus route information, information about cycle training opportunities, salary sacrifice scheme etc. 
iv)	Provide evidence of initiatives/campaigns completed that year in the Initiatives section of the 'Current Plans' page on the Hounslow School Travel Plans web site (http://hounslowtp.org).
The Travel Plan (dated May 2013) shall be undertaken and maintained as approved.
Condition : 6 - The playground shall not be used outside the hours of 09.00-16.00 Monday-Friday or at any time on Saturdays, Sundays or Public Holidays.
Condition : 7 - The ground floor of the hereby approved extension shall remain open and not be enclosed unless otherwise agreed in writing with the local planning authority.
description: Variation of condition 6 (hours of use) to allow the use of the playground from 8.00am - 5.00pm, Monday to Friday of planning permission 00180/2/P17 dated 07/05/2013 for erection of a two storey side extension to the existing independent school to incorporate an open ground floor and one new classroom and additional nursery space at first floor.
